name: A. Even Substrings
statement:
You are given a string s=s_1s_2
dots s_n of length n, which only contains digits 1, 2, ..., 9.A
substring s[l
dots r] of s is a string s_l s_{l + 1} s_{l + 2}
ldots s_r. A substring s[l
dots r] of s is called if the number represented by it is even. Find the
number of even substrings of s. Note, that even if some substrings are
equal as strings, but have different l and r, they are counted as
substrings.
